explanation: Agent A is correct. With MHD_DIGEST_HAS_EXT_ERROR defined and digest_ext_error(da) macro expanding to the constant (false), the conditional if (digest_ext_error(&da)) is statically false and its body (ret = MHD_NO;) can never be executed. That constitutes unreachable code under MISRA C 2023 Rule 2.1 (a project shall not contain unreachable code). Note: if digest_ext_error were implemented differently (not a constant false) the branch would not be unreachable; the violation only occurs in the configuration described (MHD_DIGEST_HAS_EXT_ERROR defined and digest_ext_error defined as (false)).
